Package org.neo4j.cypherdsl.core

Interface StatementBuilder.OngoingMatchAndUpdate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExposesCreate, ExposesMerge, ExposesReturning, StatementBuilder.ExposesDelete, StatementBuilder.ExposesSet, StatementBuilder.ExposesSetAndRemove, StatementBuilder.ExposesUpdatingClause, StatementBuilder.ExposesWith
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StatementBuilder.BuildableMatchAndUpdate, StatementBuilder.BuildableOngoingMergeAction
    Enclosing interface:
    StatementBuilder
    public static interface StatementBuilder.OngoingMatchAndUpdate
extends ExposesReturning, StatementBuilder.ExposesWith, StatementBuilder.ExposesUpdatingClause, ExposesCreate
    After a MATCH..UPDATE chain has been established, a RETURN can be added, a pipeline with WITH can be started or more mutating steps can be added.
    Since:
    1.0
